About GOLFTEC:
30 Years of golf improvement
Founded in 1995, GOLFTEC has since evolved into the world's largest provider of golf lessons and premium club fittings, boasting a network of over 250 centers across the globe.
With a steadfast commitment to innovation and excellence, GOLFTEC has earned its reputation as a trusted authority in golf improvement.
Golftec Mission
Mission
Help golfers of all levels play better golf. With advanced technology and teaching methods, GOLFTEC is on a journey to help 2 million golfers play better and have more fun.

Technology

GOLFTEC leads the way in golf instruction, dedicated to revolutionizing the way individuals learn and master the game.

Our History
Our Journey to helping
Two million golfers
GOLFTEC's mission is to
help people play better golf

Early Days
2010-2020
2021-Today
1995
Driving Obsession
Founded in Denver, CO
Founded by Clayton Cole. Joe Assell is hired as first teaching professional.
1997
Rebranded to GOLFTEC
Opened 3rd location in Chicago as GOLFTEC started to expand across the U.S.
2002
Patented first coaching software
GOLFTECâs original coaching software was officially patented in 2002.
2005
200 Coaches & 38 Locations
Steady growth bucked industry trends through the late 2000s by helping people play better golf.
2010
First International Store Open
GOLFTEC expands to the international market with the first store in Canada.
Teaches 2 Millionth Lesson.
2015
Celebrates 20th Anniversary
GOLFTEC launches iPad teaching software called TECswing GO.
2017
New Headquarters and Rebrand
Moves into World Headquarters in Denver, CO. Rolls out new logo and center design with state-of-the-art cameras.
2020
Battled through COVID with virtual lessons
Helped millions of golfers improve their game through the pandemic.
Teaches 10 Millionth Lesson.
2021
Exceeds 900 Coaches
GOLFTEC opens 11 new Training Centers and GOLFTEC Cares raises over $2 million for charitable giving.
2023
250th Location Opened in NYC
GOLFTEC opens it's 250th location in Manhattan.
2024
Optimotion on CBS
Optimotion swing capture technology is used during a PGA Tour event on CBS.
TODAY
Continuing innovation
Today, GOLFTEC is continuing to innovate and lead the industry forward.

What services does GOLFTEC offer?
GOLFTEC provides a wide range of services designed to help golfers of all skill levels improve their game and enjoy golf to the fullest. Our services include:
â
1. Golf Lessons
Personalized, one-on-one instruction tailored to your unique swing and goals.
Lessons leverage advanced technology like
Optimotion
for 3D motion analysis, video swing analysis, and launch monitors.
Flexible lesson plans available in 3, 6, and 12-month packages.
â
2. Swing Evaluations - Your First Golf Lesson
The starting point for your golf improvement journey.
Includes a comprehensive analysis of your swing mechanics and ball flight data.
Results in a custom improvement plan created by a certified GOLFTEC coach.
â
3. Custom Club Fitting
Professional fittings featuring hundreds of shaft options and the latest equipment from top brands like
Callaway
,
TaylorMade
,
Ping
, and
Mizuno
.
Advanced launch monitors and motion capture data analyze your swing to recommend the perfect clubs for your game.
All clubs are custom-built and competitively priced.
â
4. GOLFTEC App
A digital companion to track your progress and stay connected with your coach.
Features include lesson video reviews, personalized drills, and swing data insights.
Unlock on-course insights into your game and play your best with GPS powered club suggestion.
â
5. Junior / Youth Golf Lessons
Tailored instruction designed for young golfers to develop proper fundamentals and foster a love for the game.
â
6. Clinics and Workshops
Focused sessions to refine specific areas of your game, such as putting, short game, or driving.
Led by certified coaches, these small-group sessions combine instruction and practice.
â
At GOLFTEC, our comprehensive range of services is designed to support every aspect of your game, whether youâre just starting out, looking to break personal records, or striving for peak performance. Whatever your goals, weâre here to help you play better golf!
â
What makes GOLFTEC different from other golf instruction programs?
GOLFTEC stands out as the leader in golf instruction by combining certified coaching, cutting-edge technology, and a data-driven approach to help golfers see measurable improvement. Whether youâre a beginner or a seasoned player, our proven system delivers results that traditional golf lessons canât match.
â
1. Data-Driven Instruction
â
OPTIMOTION 3D Motion Capture
â Tracks 4,000+ data points per swing for precise analysis.
â
High-Speed Video Analysis
â See your swing in real-time and compare it to PGA Tour benchmarks.

Launch Monitors

â
2. Certified GOLFTEC Coaches

custom improvement plan
based on their swing and goals.

3. Structured Learning & Practice

Lesson Plans Built for Progress

Practice Bays with Advanced Tech
â Reinforce lessons in climate-controlled training bays with real-time feedback.
â
The GOLFTEC App
â Review lessons, track progress, and access personalized drills anytime, anywhere.
â
4. Proven Results
â
96% of GOLFTEC Students Improve
â Most students drop an average of 7 strokes from their scores.
â
Customized for Every Golfer
â From beginners to competitive players, GOLFTEC lessons are tailored to fit every skill level.
â
GOLFTEC: A Smarter Way to Improve
Unlike traditional golf instruction, GOLFTECâs combination of technology, expert coaching, and structured practice provides the fastest path to a better game. If youâre ready to see real improvement, GOLFTEC is the best choice for your golf journey.
â
Is GOLFTEC suitable for Junior Golfers?
Yes! GOLFTEC is a great option for junior golfers looking to develop their skills, build confidence, and take their game to the next level. Our lessons are designed for golfers of all ages and skill levels, including juniors who are just starting out or working toward competitive goals.
â
Why GOLFTEC Is Great for Junior Golfers
â
Customized Coaching
â Our certified coaches tailor instruction to each junior golferâs skill level, swing, and learning style.
â
Advanced Technology
â Video analysis, OPTIMOTION swing tracking, and launch monitors help juniors see and understand their progress.
â
Fundamental Skill Development
â Lessons focus on swing mechanics, ball striking, short game, and course management to create well-rounded players.
â
Flexible Lesson Plans
â We offer individual lessons and structured programs to fit juniorsâ schedules and development needs.
â
Builds Confidence & Enjoyment
â By tracking progress and seeing measurable improvement, juniors gain confidence and a love for the game.
â
What Age Groups Does GOLFTEC Teach?
GOLFTEC provides instruction for juniors of all ages, from beginners learning the fundamentals to advanced players preparing for high school, college, or junior tournaments.
â
What happens if I moveâcan I continue my lessons at another GOLFTEC location?
Yes! If you move, you can continue your lessons at any GOLFTEC location nationwide or internationally. With over 250 locations worldwide, your lesson plan, progress, and swing data seamlessly transfer to your new center.
How It Works:
â
Seamless Transition
â Your lesson history, swing videos, and improvement plan are stored in the GOLFTEC App, so you can pick up right where you left off.
â
Easy Location Transfer
â Our team will help transfer your lessons to your new GOLFTEC center, ensuring a smooth transition.
â
Consistent Coaching Experience
â All GOLFTEC coaches follow the same proven teaching methodology, so youâll receive the same high-quality instruction no matter where you go.
â
Next Steps If Youâre Moving:
â
Find Your New GOLFTEC Center
â Use our location finder to find the nearest center.
â
Contact Your Current Coach
â Let your coach know youâre moving, and theyâll assist with the transfer.
â
Resume Lessons at Your New Location
â Keep improving without missing a beat!
â
At GOLFTEC, we make it easy to continue your improvement journeyâno matter where life takes you.
â
Do I need to be an experienced golfer to take lessons at GOLFTEC?
No! GOLFTEC welcomes golfers of all skill levels, from complete beginners to seasoned players looking to fine-tune their game. Our certified coaches create a personalized improvement plan based on your current skill level and goals.
â
Why GOLFTEC Is Great for Beginners:
â
No Experience Needed
â Our coaches start with the fundamentals and build a strong foundation for your game.
â
Easy-to-Follow Lessons
â Using video analysis, motion capture, and launch monitors, we simplify complex swing concepts.
â
Structured Learning
â Unlike random lessons, our step-by-step approach ensures steady improvement at your own pace.
â
Practice Support
â After each lesson, you get structured practice sessions to reinforce what youâve learned.
â
For Experienced Golfers
If youâre already playing and want to lower your scores, our
data-driven instruction
and customized drills will help refine your technique and eliminate problem areas.
At GOLFTEC, every golferâbeginner or experiencedâgets the coaching and tools needed to play better and gain confidence on the course.
â
How do I book a lesson or club fitting at GOLFTEC?
Booking a golf lesson or custom club fitting at GOLFTEC is quick and easy. Whether youâre looking to improve your swing or get fitted for the perfect clubs, our process ensures a seamless experience.
1. Online Booking
â Visit the
Book a Service page
and select your nearest location.
â Choose
Swing Evaluation or
Club Fitting
options.

GOLFTEC center
to speak with a certified coach.

For Lessons

For Club Fitting

â
No matter your skill level, GOLFTEC makes it easy to take the first step toward better golf and lower scores.
â
Are GOLFTEC lessons available year-round?
Yes! GOLFTEC lessons are available year-round, thanks to our climate-controlled indoor training bays. No matter the weather, you can keep improving your game in a comfortable, private setting with advanced technology and expert coaching.
â
Why Year-Round Lessons Matter:
â
Consistent Improvement
â Stay on track with your swing and game development all year.
â
Weather-Proof Practice
â No need to worry about rain, snow, or extreme temperatures.
â
High-Tech Training Environment
â Work on your game using video analysis, launch monitors, and Optimotion swing tracking.
â
Off-Season Preparation
â Use the colder months to refine your technique and be ready for peak golf season.
â
Whether youâre looking to fine-tune your swing, lower your scores, or prepare for the next golf season, GOLFTEC lessons provide a consistent, data-driven approach to improvementâanytime, all year long.
â
Do I Need to Bring My Own Clubs to Lessons or a Club Fitting at GOLFTEC?
No, you donât need to bring your own clubs to your GOLFTEC lesson or club fitting, but youâre welcome to if you prefer.
For Lessons:
â
Clubs Are Available
â GOLFTEC provides clubs for use during lessons if you donât bring your own.
â
Using Your Own Clubs
â Bringing your clubs can help coaches assess how they match your swing and suggest improvements.
â
Custom Improvement Plan
â If your clubs arenât the best fit, your coach may recommend adjustments or a club fitting.
â
For Club Fittings:
â
Testing the Latest Equipment
â We provide access to the newest clubs from Callaway, TaylorMade, Ping, Titleist, Mizuno, and more.
â
Using Your Own Clubs
â Comparing your current clubs to new options helps determine if an upgrade will improve your game.
â
The Shaft Wall
â Our fitters use hundreds of shaft and head combinations to find your perfect fit.
â
Whatâs Best for You?
Bringing your clubs can be helpful, but whether you bring them or use ours, GOLFTEC ensures a data-driven, expert experience for both lessons and club fittings.
â
What should I expect from golf lessons?
At GOLFTEC, every golf lesson is designed to provide personalized instruction, real-time feedback, and measurable improvement. Hereâs what to expect when you step into one of our training bays:
1.
Expert Coaching from Certified Instructors
Our highly trained GOLFTEC Certified Coaches will guide you through each session, analyzing your swing and tailoring instruction to your skill level, goals, and playing style.

2. Advanced Technology for Real-Time Feedback

OPTIMOTION Technology

3.
A Personalized Lesson Plan

4.I
mmediate Application with Practice Time

After each lesson, youâll have the opportunity to reinforce what youâve learned with a dedicated practice session in a climate-controlled bay, using the same technology to track your progress.

Results You Can Expect

How much do golf lessons typically cost?
The cost of golf lessons at GOLFTEC varies based on lesson packages, coaching programs, and location. Hereâs what you need to know:
1. Swing Evaluation â Starting at $95

2. Custom Lesson Plans

Lesson Plans

3. Custom Club Fitting Services

Get a Personalized Quote

request pricing from your nearest GOLFTEC center
.
â
What technology does GOLFTEC use in lessons?
GOLFTEC leverages cutting-edge technology to provide golfers with data-driven insights and measurable improvement. Our advanced tools help analyze and refine every aspect of your swing for faster, more effective progress.
1. OPTIMOTION 3D Motion Capture
â Tracks 4,000+ data points per swing without the need for sensors.
â Provides real-time swing analysis and comparisons to PGA Tour benchmarks.
â
2. High-Speed Video Analysis
â Captures detailed swing mechanics from multiple angles.
â Allows for side-by-side comparisons to track progress over time.
â
3. Advanced Launch Monitors
â Measures ball speed, spin rate, launch angle, dispersion and more for precise feedback.
â Helps fine-tune club selection and swing adjustments.
â
4. The GOLFTEC App
â Stores lesson videos, swing data, and custom drills for anytime access.
â Lets you track progress and review coaching feedback between sessions.
â
Why GOLFTEC Technology Matters
By combining expert coaching with industry-leading technology, GOLFTEC delivers a faster, more effective path to improvement, helping golfers lower their scores with real-time, actionable insights.
â
What are the benefits of taking golf lessons?
Golf lessons provide structured, expert guidance to help golfers of all skill levels improve their game. Whether youâre a beginner learning the basics or an experienced player refining your swing, professional instruction can lead to faster progress and better results.
â
1. Personalized Coaching
Certified coaches tailor each lesson to your unique swing, skill level, and goals, ensuring focused and effective improvement.
â
2. Advanced Technology & Data-Driven Feedback
GOLFTEC lessons use OPTIMOTION 3D motion capture, video analysis, and launch monitor data to give you real-time feedback and track your progress.
â
3. More Consistency & Lower Scores
By improving fundamentals like swing mechanics, ball striking, and course management, lessons help you eliminate bad habits, gain confidence, and lower your scores.
â
4. Faster Improvement vs. Self-Teaching
Instead of trial and error, structured lessons accelerate improvement with drills, practice plans, and expert insights that help you make lasting changes.
â
5. Long-Term Game Development
Golf lessons provide ongoing skill development, from short game and putting to driving distance and course strategy, helping you play better and enjoy the game more.
â
GOLFTECâs Proven Approach to Golf Lessons
With certified coaches, cutting-edge technology, and personalized instruction, GOLFTEC delivers proven results, with most students seeing an average of 7 strokes dropped from their scores.
What Is a Swing Evaluation, and Why Is It Important?
A Swing Evaluation is the first step in your golf improvement journey at GOLFTEC. Itâs a comprehensive swing analysis session where a certified GOLFTEC coach uses advanced technology to assess your swing, identify areas for improvement, and create a personalized lesson plan tailored to your goals.
â
Why Is a Swing Evaluation Important?
â
Identifies Key Swing Issues
â Using video analysis, OPTIMOTION motion capture, and launch monitor data, we pinpoint whatâs helping or hurting your swing.
â
Creates a Personalized Improvement Plan
â Your coach designs a custom game plan based on your swing and skill level.
â
Provides Data-Driven Insights
â Instead of guessing, you get measurable feedback on your mechanics, ball flight, and consistency.
â
Sets the Foundation for Long-Term Progress
â Whether youâre a beginner or a seasoned player, the Swing Evaluation guides your improvement strateg
y
for lasting results.
â
What Happens During a Swing Evaluation?
â
Coach Consultation
â Discuss your goals, challenges, and playing history.
Swing Analysis
â Record and review your swing using high-speed video and motion capture.
â
Ball Flight & Impact Data
â Use launch monitors to measure spin, club path, and more.
â
Personalized Game Plan
â Your coach outlines the best lesson and practice strategy for improvement.
â
A Swing Evaluation helps golfers understand their swing like never before, giving them a clear roadmap to play better, more consistent golf.
â
Why is club fitting important?
Club fitting is essential for maximizing distance, accuracy, and consistency in your golf game. Properly fitted clubs are tailored to your swing speed, ball flight, and playing style, ensuring you get the best performance from every shot.
â
1. Better Distance & Accuracy
A custom-fit driver, irons, or wedges optimize launch, spin, and ball speed, helping you hit longer and straighter shots with more consistency.
â
2. Improved Ball Striking
Clubs that match your height, stance, and swing mechanics allow for better contact and fewer mishits, leading to greater control and confidence.
â
3. Consistency Across Your Bag
Every club should work together for a balanced set that provides gaps in distance, so youâre never guessing which club to hit.
â
4. Personalized Shaft & Grip Selection
The right shaft flex, weight, and material can impact ball flight, while proper grip size improves control and comfort.
â
5. Long-Term Performance & Comfort
Playing with improperly fitted clubs can cause inconsistencies, unnecessary swing adjustments, and even discomfort over time. A proper fitting ensures clubs complement your natural swing for sustainable improvement.
â
GOLFTEC Club Fitting: Data-Driven Precision
GOLFTECâs custom club fittings use advanced launch monitors, shaft optimization, and the Shaft Wall to match you with the best equipment from top brands like Callaway, TaylorMade, PING, and more.
â
Whether youâre upgrading your set or fine-tuning your current clubs, a professional club fitting can help you play your best golf with equipment designed just for you.
â
Does GOLFTEC sell golf clubs, or just fit them?
GOLFTEC both fits and sells golf clubs, offering a custom club fitting experience with the latest equipment from top brands. After your fitting, you can purchase your custom-fit clubs directly through GOLFTEC at competitive prices matching major retailers.
â
Why Buy Clubs Through GOLFTEC?
â
Precision Club Fitting
â Using advanced launch monitors and the Shaft Wall, our certified fitters find the perfect clubs for your swing.
â
Top Golf Brands
â We fit and sell clubs from Callaway, TaylorMade, PING, Titleist, Mizuno, Cobra, and more.
â

â
Seamless Ordering Process
â Once fitted, we handle the ordering process, ensuring your clubs are built to your exact specifications.
â
Better Performance Starts with the Right Clubs
Whether youâre upgrading your set or dialing in your equipment for peak performance, GOLFTEC makes it easy to get fit and buy the perfect clubs for your game.
â
How does GOLFTECâs custom club fitting process work?
GOLFTECâs custom club fitting process is designed to match you with the perfect clubs for your swing using advanced technology and expert analysis. Whether you need a single club or a full set, our data-driven approach ensures better performance and consistency on the course.
Step 1: Swing & Ball Flight Analysis
â Using high-speed cameras and launch monitors, we capture key swing data, including club speed, ball speed, launch angle, and spin rates.
â This data helps us determine the best club specifications for your game.
â
Step 2: Testing & Club Selection
â Youâll test
the latest clubs from top brands
like Callaway, TaylorMade, PING, Titleist, Mizuno, and more.
â Our certified fitters analyze your performance and compare different club heads, shafts, and grip options.
â
Step 3: Shaft Wall Customization
â We utilize GOLFTECâs Shaft Wall, offering hundreds of shaft options in various weights, flexes, and materials to optimize feel and performance.
â
Step 4: Club Recommendations & Ordering
â Your fitter will recommend the best combination of club head, shaft, and grip tailored to your swing.
â Once youâve made your selections, weâll order your custom-built clubs at competitive pricing, matching major retailers.
â
Why Choose GOLFTEC for Custom Club Fitting?
â
Advanced Technology
â Data-driven fittings with launch monitors and OPTIMOTION analysis.
â

At GOLFTEC, our custom club fitting process ensures you play with clubs that are built for your game, your swing, and your goals.

Can I get fitted for just one club, or do I need a full set?
Yes! At GOLFTEC, you can get fitted for a single club or an entire set, depending on your needs. Whether youâre looking for a new driver, iron, wedge, putter, or full bag fitting, our certified club fitters use advanced technology to ensure every club is optimized for your swing.

Types of Club Fittings at GOLFTEC:

Whether you need one club or a full set, GOLFTECâs data-driven club fitting process ensures you play with equipment that enhances your performance and fits your swing perfectly.
